title: forgot my email pass and forgot everything about the email.
body:
Well i have made an email for a long time and after a months i quited league... so when i got back i figured that  i forgot my email password and everything about that email.. so when i wanted to change email they said they  sent a code to that email.. that i forgot. and idk what to do .. i have bougth rp for this account and i dont wanna make a new account and lose everything..
 Hope u help me with my proplem..

replies.body: Don't worry we can help you out directly!  Hit us up directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can update your info so it's sent to the correct email and assist with restoring access.  See you there!
